Mongrel Mob gang members cleared of Mitchell Te Kani’s murder, some guilty of manslaughter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-gang-members-cleared-of-mitchell-te-kanis-murder-some-guilty-of-manslaughter/QPLYXMLVSNEGTOTY4X23E4ER4A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-gang-members-cleared-of-mitchell-te-kanis-murder-some-guilty-of-manslaughter/QPLYXMLVSNEGTOTY4X23E4ER4A/ Belinda FeekThe jury's marathon deliberations ran for two weeks.Thu, 07 Nov 2024 05:47:17 +0000 Nine people defended multiple charges, including the murder of Tauranga man Mitchell Te Kani, in the High Court at Hamilton. A tenth defendant, Jamie Thomas, had all of his charges dismissed. Photo / NZME

Two babies’ deaths at centre of heavily suppressed coroner’s hearinghttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-babies-deaths-at-centre-of-heavily-suppressed-coroners-hearing/2WO43DNI4FCHPATATBUHTG5BMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-babies-deaths-at-centre-of-heavily-suppressed-coroners-hearing/2WO43DNI4FCHPATATBUHTG5BMA/ No one has ever been charged in relation to the children's deaths. Thu, 07 Nov 2024 05:23:07 +0000 Secrecy surrounds the deaths of two babies a decade ago that are the subject of a heavily suppressed coroner's hearing. Photo / 123RF
Dashcam captures rental van swerving on West Auckland road, narrowly avoiding head-on collision https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dashcam-captures-rental-van-swerving-on-west-auckland-road-narrowly-avoiding-head-on-collision/RCX5BIJQ2BB3PFRROPZOWIAPIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dashcam-captures-rental-van-swerving-on-west-auckland-road-narrowly-avoiding-head-on-collision/RCX5BIJQ2BB3PFRROPZOWIAPIU/ Benjamin PlummerA witness said the van and its driver almost became a near-certain road toll statistic. Thu, 07 Nov 2024 05:20:10 +0000 The van narrowly avoided a head-on collision with oncoming traffic after swerving on to the wrong side of the road.
